In the coming weeks you will be able to search for GDKP, Tauri Credit and Guild recruitment messages which you will also be able upload manually after registering.
I am back on developing the website. Latest changes:

Sikeresen újraírtam a rendszer bizonyos: I have successfully rewritten parts of the system, thus you can now search for more data regarding encounters.
Legközelebb még több feature várható!: More features to come next time!
Az útóbbi hónapban egyre többen látogatj: For the past few weeks the amount of visitors has been increasing, as has the data from encounters! While this makes ME happy, the webserver was under a lot of load.
Emiatt az utóbbi hónapban a PVE ladder o: Thus most of my time has been taken up by optimizing the PVE ladder page and reworking how the filter/search works. I hope the user experience has been increased and you enjoy it!
Egyéb hírekben: Chris megírta a supporto: In other news: Chris implemented support so that in-game messages from world/global/trade chat now also get sent from Evermoon and WoD, hence you can now see them on the Trade page. I have also re-added the Raid trade page, but there is a lot of work left to be done on it!
Ezentúl nem csak Githubon hanem már Trel: From now on you can follow TauriBay's development on Trello as well:
, vagy az új zöld kis ikon segítségével: , or by clicking on the new small green icon in the navigation bar.
Végre megcsináltam a Kari és Raid hirdet: I finally optimized the Character and Raid pages (on Trade page) for mobile, no more issues on your small screen! Last week's optimizations were a success and the server load has been reduced a lot, but the underlying Cache system needs more work. I have loads of ideas planned for the future: all of which will be added to the Trello bard!
P.S. Lehet szűrni a Guild oldalkon belűl: P.S. You can now filter on a Guild's page!

Végre rávettem magam pár hete, hogy elme: I have finally taken it upon myself a few weeks ago to implement the Loot feature. From now on, on an encounter page next to the DPS and HPS tabs, you will be able to see the encounter loot as well. You will also be able to check out each bosses loot drop chances on the boss pages, on the Loot tab.
A player oldalon már nagyon rég óta gond: The player page has been on my mind for a long time and it's finally available now, but previous encounter datas will take 1-2 weeks to fill up. But what exactly is DPS and HPS scoring you might ask?
Minden fight után a játékos DPS és HPSje: After every encounter, the player's DPS and HPS is compared to the top 5 dps/hps of the same class and spec player who is within -4 and +4 item levels of the player's gear. If someone is below 100% it means they are underperforming, and if they are over 100, the surplus is equal to how much they are overperforming!
Ez a weboldal a felhasználói élmény javí: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website
Ez elmúlt hónapban nagyrészt inkább javí: In the past month I have mostly done fixes and optimizations on the code. However I was also able to add a few new features:
Az új PVE létra most már Realm és Frakci: The new PVE Ladder now saves Speed kills and Top DPSs on a Realm and Faction basis.
Sikerült megoldani, hogy a random raidek: I was able to assign faction data to random raids, and now instead of showing the fastest random raid in the Speed kill section, the fastest kills of all 3 realms and their factions (so 6) will be shown.
Valamint most már Normal nehézségű progr: Also, from now on you can find data about Normal progression on the Guild page:
Továbbá a Score rendszer már nem foglalk: And finally the Score system no longer considers the iLvL of the player, it simply compares dps (for damage dealers), hps (for healers) to the top data of the same spec on the specific boss and difficulty.
Na de a legfontosabb hír, hogy a TauriBa: But the most important news is that TauriBay now runs on an Intel Xeon server (it was running on low performance ARM processors before). This, combined with the awesome Cache system, which can now also be manually refreshed (the little green refresh icon) will ensure super fast response times.
Ezek az adatok nincsenek helyes sorrendb: These datas are not in a correct order and some of their Speed Kill values are missing due to random members (not only Guild) participating on either Jin'Rokh or Lei Shen.
